title: Samsung MagicINFO 9 Server FtpMetaUploadServlet Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Samsung MagicINFO 9 Server. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed.
The specific flaw exists within the FtpMetaUploadServlet class. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Samsung has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://security.samsungtv.com/securityUpdates
